item.description:
Piccola Venezia (www.PiccolaVeneziaBoston.com) has many choices for lunch, all moderately priced. And the portions are large. Items include Soups $3.95-5.50, Salads $4.95-12.95, Sandwiches $6.95-9.50, Entrees $5.95-11.95 and Desserts $4.50-6.95. We'll gather around the bar from 12:00-1:00 and get seated around 1:00. the restaurant is at 263 Hanover St. As you walk down the right side of Hanover, coming from the Greenway, it's on the first block. It would be best to bring cash as there won't be separate checks. So let's make our first foray to "Little Venice" and have some good Italian food.

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'About' tab for further event guidelines.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the bar until about 1:00.
item.name: Piccola Venezia-Lunch
